oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Compact broadband stacked microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: broadband microstrip antenna
stacked microstrip antenna
c-shaped
h-shaped
square ring
s-shaped
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various stacked broadband microstrip antennas using compact variations of the rectangular microstrip antenna, such as C-shaped, H-shaped, square-ring and S-shaped antennas, are proposed. The effects of using combinations of these compact antennas as a fed or stacked element on the bandwidth, gain, and radiation pattern of the antenna are discussed. (c) 2005 .
